member.summary: Common constants used throughout the project.

member.name: F:SixLabors.Constants.Epsilon
member.summary: The epsilon for comparing floating point numbers.

member.name: T:SixLabors.GeometryUtilities
member.summary: Utility class for common geometric functions.

member.name: M:SixLabors.GeometryUtilities.DegreeToRadian(System.Single)
member.summary: Converts a degree (360-periodic) angle to a radian (2*Pi-periodic) angle.
member.returns: The representing the degree as radians.

member.name: M:SixLabors.GeometryUtilities.RadianToDegree(System.Single)
member.summary: Converts a radian (2*Pi-periodic) angle to a degree (360-periodic) angle.
member.returns: The representing the degree as radians.

member.name: T:SixLabors.Memory.AllocationOptions
member.summary: Options for allocating buffers.

member.name: F:SixLabors.Memory.AllocationOptions.None
member.summary: Indicates that the buffer should just be allocated.

member.name: F:SixLabors.Memory.AllocationOptions.Clean
member.summary: Indicates that the allocated buffer should be cleaned following allocation.

member.name: T:SixLabors.Memory.ArrayPoolMemoryAllocator
member.summary: Contains and .
Contains common factory methods and configuration constants.
Implements by allocating memory from .

member.name: T:SixLabors.Memory.ArrayPoolMemoryAllocator.Buffer`1
member.summary: The buffer implementation of .

member.name: F:SixLabors.Memory.ArrayPoolMemoryAllocator.Buffer`1.length
member.summary: The length of the buffer.

member.name: F:SixLabors.Memory.ArrayPoolMemoryAllocator.Buffer`1.sourcePoolReference
member.summary: A weak reference to the source pool.
member.remarks: By using a weak reference here, we are making sure that array pools and their retained arrays are always GC-ed after a call to , regardless of having buffer instances still being in use.

member.name: P:SixLabors.Memory.ArrayPoolMemoryAllocator.Buffer`1.Data
member.summary: Gets the buffer as a byte array.

member.name: T:SixLabors.Memory.ArrayPoolMemoryAllocator.ManagedByteBuffer
member.summary: The implementation of .

member.name: F:SixLabors.Memory.ArrayPoolMemoryAllocator.DefaultMaxPooledBufferSizeInBytes
member.summary: The default value for: maximum size of pooled arrays in bytes. Currently set to 24MB, which is equivalent to 8 megapixels of raw RGBA32 data.

member.name: F:SixLabors.Memory.ArrayPoolMemoryAllocator.DefaultBufferSelectorThresholdInBytes
member.summary: The value for: The threshold to pool arrays in which has less buckets for memory safety.

member.name: F:SixLabors.Memory.ArrayPoolMemoryAllocator.DefaultLargePoolBucketCount
member.summary: The default bucket count for .

member.name: F:SixLabors.Memory.ArrayPoolMemoryAllocator.DefaultNormalPoolBucketCount
member.summary: The default bucket count for .

member.name: M:SixLabors.Memory.ArrayPoolMemoryAllocator.CreateDefault
member.summary: This is the default. Should be good for most use cases.

member.name: M:SixLabors.Memory.ArrayPoolMemoryAllocator.CreateWithMinimalPooling
member.summary: For environments with very limited memory capabilities, only small buffers like image rows are pooled.

member.name: M:SixLabors.Memory.ArrayPoolMemoryAllocator.CreateWithModeratePooling
member.summary: For environments with limited memory capabilities, only small array requests are pooled, which can result in reduced throughput.

member.name: M:SixLabors.Memory.ArrayPoolMemoryAllocator.CreateWithAggressivePooling
member.summary: For environments where memory capabilities are not an issue, the maximum amount of array requests are pooled which results in optimal throughput.

member.name: F:SixLabors.Memory.ArrayPoolMemoryAllocator.normalArrayPool
member.summary: The for small-to-medium buffers which is not kept clean.

member.name: F:SixLabors.Memory.ArrayPoolMemoryAllocator.largeArrayPool
member.summary: The for huge buffers, which is not kept clean.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:SixLabors.Memory.ArrayPoolMemoryAllocator.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The maximum size of pooled arrays. Arrays over the thershold are gonna be always allocated.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The maximum size of pooled arrays. Arrays over the thershold are gonna be always allocated.
Arrays over this threshold will be pooled in which has less buckets for memory safety.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The maximum size of pooled arrays. Arrays over the thershold are gonna be always allocated.
The threshold to pool arrays in which has less buckets for memory safety.

Max arrays per bucket for the normal array pool.

member.summary: Gets the maximum size of pooled arrays in bytes.

member.name: P:SixLabors.Memory.ArrayPoolMemoryAllocator.PoolSelectorThresholdInBytes
member.summary: Gets the threshold to pool arrays in which has less buckets for memory safety.

member.name: T:SixLabors.Primitives.Point
member.summary: Represents an ordered pair of integer x- and y-coordinates that defines a point in a two-dimensional plane.
member.remarks: This struct is fully mutable. This is done (against the guidelines) for the sake of performance, as it avoids the need to create new values for modification operations.
